hero.descripcion: I'm a passionate Full Stack developer with a mission to create intuitive and functional digital experiences. Translating complex ideas into complete web solutions.

about.descripcionAcademica: Currently pursuing my Information Technology Engineering degree with a focus on modern web technologies and software development. Maintaining a strong focus on both academic excellence and practical project development.

psm.descripcion: Full-stack platform for event management in Puntarenas. Frontend with React 19, Tailwind CSS, Radix UI and Framer Motion. Backend with Django REST Framework, JWT authentication, MySQL, MongoDB and n8n automation.

taller.descripcion: Auto repair shop management system with authentication, QR ticket generator, appointment and service history, admin panel and comment moderation.

loverequest.descripcion: Interactive web app for creating and customizing creative date requests. Features pricing plans, user profiles and modern design.

contact.placeholderMensaje: Hi, I'd love to work with you...
